exibitor_information:
Professional Manufacturer of Connectors and Electronic Components

About Kinsun Industries Inc.
Founded in Taiwan in 1986, Kinsun Industries Inc. is a trusted leader in the manufacturing of connectors and electronic components. Our expertise spans antennas, waterproof connectors, RJ jacks, a variety of connectors, and precision stamping parts. With over 37 years of experience, we are dedicated to delivering not just products but also comprehensive solutions, including tooling design, metal stamping, and plastic injection.

Expertise and Innovation
Leveraging decades of experience, we continuously push the boundaries of technology. Backed by an innovative R&D team and a fully equipped in-house tooling center, we efficiently develop new products and customize solutions to meet the evolving needs of our clients.

Global Expansion
To support large-scale production and meet urgent delivery demands, Kinsun expanded globally by establishing factories in China: one in Guang-Zhou in 1999 and another in Su-Zhou in 2001. These facilities significantly enhanced our production capacity, enabling us to better serve our international clients.

Quality and Certification
Kinsun operates under ISO 9001:2015 and ISO 14001:2015 certifications, ensuring robust quality management. We pride ourselves on delivering reliable and high-quality products, earning the trust of leading global companies like ABB, Festo, Siemens, Yamaichi, and Samsung.

Facilities and Workforce
With a combined factory space exceeding 80,000 square meters across Taiwan and China, Kinsun is powered by a team of over 500 skilled employees. Our extensive infrastructure allows us to consistently meet and surpass customer expectations.

exibitor_information:
Lasertech Chemical Machining Group was the first Italian group to develop the photo chemical milling (PCM), a high technology process which consist of controlled removal of metal through the etchant; It is particularly convenient in the case of high precision, even few tens micron, of complex parts on a wide range of metal alloys up to 2mm of thickness.

exibitor_information:
Mancin S.r.l., founded in 1981, has over 40 years of expertise in the precision mechanical industry. With a skilled team of 15 employees and a 3,000-square-meter facility, the company is distinguished by its flexibility and production capacity. Our operations feature multi-axis CNC milling and turning centers, automated surface grinding, a dedicated assembly department, and a 3D metrology lab to ensure quality and precision.

Mancin Srl's machinery is capable of processing most of the materials used in the manufacture of industrial components. In addition to constant investment in plant maintenance and renewal, the desire to better control and manage production processes has led the company to integrate all machining operations by directly managing all phases of the supply chain.

With a view to increasing servitisation, we provide our customers with a range of complementary services, such as: prototyping, heat and surface treatments, marking, welding, storage of semi-finished and/or finished products, dedicated packaging and logistics.Through our technical department we can also offer an engineering consultancy service.
